name: Doki Office Man
description:
Destroy everything in your path in order to get revenge upon the corporation that has ruined your life and destroyed your soul. Your objective is to kill all of your ex-coworkers before the timer runs out and the police arrest you. 

(The WEBGL build requires a beefy computer and a decent internet connection to decompress and run it well.  It's also much glitchier than the standalone .exe, the audio tends to bug out and the game gets slower each time it restarts; I recommend playing the windows version.)

I will be addressing these issues when the jam officially ends, but my sincerest thanks to everyone who played it! (:

Tips: 
  • Shoot the locked doors with your gun in order to access blocked off areas!
  • Watch out for the bugs, this office is filled with them.
  • You can't run and shoot at the same time, silly.
Controls:
  • WASD - MOVEMENT
  • LEFT CLICK  - SHOOT
  • SHIFT - RUN
Animations were made in unity or come from Mixamo. The environment assets come from this pack: 
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/interior/simple-office-interiors-... The rest of the models were made in blender.
The music was made in FL Studio.
The intro voice acting was entirely done with 15.ai. Special thanks to my girlfriend Rochelle for doing the rest of the voices last night at one in the morning.
